headline: Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) Expands its Shipbuilding Capacity
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. (NYSE:HII) is one of the Undervalued Aerospace Stocks to Buy Now. On September 11, Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. (NYSE:HII) announced that it is expanding its shipbuilding capacity by partnering with shipyards and fabricators across several states. This strategic move aims to meet the growing demand for ships from the US Navy. […]
